last_episode_to_air.name: Prisoners of War
last_episode_to_air.overview: Operation Judas is underway; Sheik Qassab pays Leila a visit; Amiel returns home; Haim has his doubts about the operation; Amiel faces the greatest conflict of his life.

name: Prisoners of War
overview: After 17 years in captivity, Israeli soldiers Nimrode Klein, Uri Zach, and Amiel Ben Horin return home to the country that made them national icons. They work to overcome the trauma of torture and captivity while settling back into their interrupted family lives. Meanwhile, the military psychiatrist assigned to them finds discrepancies in the soldiers' testimonies, and launches an investigation to discover what they are hiding.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: After 17 years in captivity, three Israeli soldiers are finally returned to their families -- one of them in a coffin.

episodes.name: Homecoming
episodes.overview: The negotiations for the release of three Israeli soldiers has ended successfully, and after 17 years in captivity, Nimrod Klein, Uri Zach and Amiel Ben Chorin are coming home.

episodes.name: The Facility, part 1
episodes.overview: Nimrod and Uri are taken to an interrogation facility designed for released Israeli prisoners of war in the small town of Zichron Ya'akov.

episodes.name: The Facility, part 2
episodes.overview: Haim investigates Nimrod and Uri at the interrogation facility.

episodes.name: Letters From Mom
episodes.overview: Uri is depressed. He refuses to leave his bed. Nurit tries to talk to him, but he refuses to answer the phone.

episodes.name: Keep Your Soul
episodes.overview: At the funeral of Amiel Ben Horin, everybody is there but Yael feels all alone.

episodes.name: The Journal
episodes.overview: Nimrod appears on national TV and recounts his experiences during his 17 years in captivity.

episodes.name: A Picture from Captivity
episodes.overview: Talia and Nimrod enjoy time alone in their bedroom after the kids leave the house.

episodes.name: ...And They Return to Egypt
episodes.overview: Uri and Nimrod disappear, and their families are starting to get worried; the Klein family is finding a few joyous moments, precisely when Nimrod is not there.

episodes.name: Awake at Night
episodes.overview: Nimrod still suffers from nightmares, especially about the night he killed Amiel.

episodes.name: Unveiling of a Monument
episodes.overview: Talia makes Nimrod choose between a future with her or a life of misery.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: After 17 years in captivity, three Israeli soldiers are finally returned to their families -- one of them in a coffin.

episodes.name: Goodbye, Sweetie
episodes.overview: Uri and Nimrode try to push the Ministry of Defense into figuring out where Amiel is by exposing the CD they got from Ruth Shorer.

episodes.name: Happy Birthday
episodes.overview: Talia breaks down while Nimrode is out partying; Uri and Nurit try to bridge their gap; Yussuf and Abdullah head out to handle an arms deal.

episodes.name: Little Lies
episodes.overview: The past troubles Yussuf; Abdullah tries to recruit children to be martyrs; Uri shares the horrors of captivity with Nurit.

episodes.name: Blue
episodes.overview: The connection between Jamal and Amiel is revealed; Yussuf struggles with the consequences of the shooting and the pressure to execute an act of terrorism against Israel.

episodes.name: Platoon Secretary
episodes.overview: Iris and Haim discover new details in the investigation; a cat-and-mouse detective game develops between Haim and Ze'ev, who is busy training the talented Yinon.

episodes.name: Beaches
episodes.overview: Atar Shorer recruits Yinon; a new direction in Haim and Iris's investigation leads them to "Operation Judas."

episodes.name: The Picture
episodes.overview: Haim Cohen orders Uri and Iris to investigate the picture of the man; Nimrod struggles with adapting to his new life.

episodes.name: Death of an Agent
episodes.overview: Yussuf is not pleased with Ismail's new bond with Abdullah; Talia and Dr. Ostrovsky go out on a date; Uri suffers from poor health and goes to see his doctor.

episodes.name: Mika's Boyfriend
episodes.overview: The mind games between Ze'ev and Haim continue as new details are exposed regarding Operation Judas and Yinon's true mission.

episodes.name: Halva
episodes.overview: Haim tries to extract more details on Operation Judas from Ze'ev; together they work on cracking the code that Atar and Jamal use to communicate.

episodes.name: Our Woman in Damascus
episodes.overview: Uri's health is deteriorating; Nimrode reveals another detail regarding what happened with Amiel; Nurit embarks on a mission behind enemy lines; Yussuf tries to avoid Abdullah.

episodes.name: The Hannibal Procedure
episodes.overview: The soldier's kidnapping affects everyone; Yinon goes through the final phase of preparations for Operation Judas; Hatzav is drafted to the army.

episodes.name: Operation Judah
episodes.overview: The soldier's kidnapping awakens feelings of guilt in Nimrode; Yael worries about the identity of the kidnapped soldier; Yinon puts his special training to use for Operation Judas.

episodes.name: Prisoners of War
episodes.overview: Operation Judas is underway; Sheik Qassab pays Leila a visit; Amiel returns home; Haim has his doubts about the operation; Amiel faces the greatest conflict of his life.
